Package managers

Class POIManager

java.lang.Object
managers.POIManager
public class POIManager extends Object
This class will be used to manage the points of interest (POIs) and the routes between them

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changeStrategy(boolean shortest)
    Changes the strategy of the container to either DijkstraOptimized or DijkstraCost
    List<Route>
    findRoute(PointOfInterest start, PointOfInterest destination, Car car)
    Finds the shortest route between two points of interest (POIs) using strategy which is set in the container

    getInstance()
     
    List<PointOfInterest>
    getPOIs()
    Returns a list of POIs

    getPOIsMap()
    Returns a map of POIs with their names as keys

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static POIManager getInstance()

    • findRoute

      public List<Route> findRoute(PointOfInterest start, PointOfInterest destination, Car car)
      Finds the shortest route between two points of interest (POIs) using strategy which is set in the container
      Parameters:
      start - the starting POI
      destination - the destination POI
      car - the car that will be used to travel the route
      Returns:
      List

    • changeStrategy

      public void changeStrategy(boolean shortest)
      Changes the strategy of the container to either DijkstraOptimized or DijkstraCost
      Parameters:
      shortest - if true, the strategy will be DijkstraOptimized, otherwise DijkstraCost

    • getPOIs

      public List<PointOfInterest> getPOIs()
      Returns a list of POIs
      Returns:
      List

    • getPOIsMap

      public Map<String,PointOfInterest> getPOIsMap()
      Returns a map of POIs with their names as keys
      Returns:
      Map<String, PointOfInterest>
